io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.net

Interface TickBased

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Client, Client2D, Server, Server2D

    public interface TickBased
    An interface for systems based on a constant tick rate.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DebugFrame getDebugFrame()
      Gets the most recent debug frame for the system.
      java.lang.String getMainThreadName()
      Gets the name to be used for the main thread of the system.
      double getTickSpeed()
      Gets the speed of the system in ticks per second.
      default java.lang.String getType()
      Gets the type of the system.
      default java.lang.String getTypeTitle()
      Gets the type of the system in title case.
      void init()
      Initialises the system.
      boolean isInit()
      Determines if initialisation has been completed.
      default void start()
      Start the system.
      void stop()
      Stops the system.

      Converts a string to title case
      void update(double delta)
      Called per tick for an update.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        default void start()
        Start the system.

      • getType

        default java.lang.String getType()
        Gets the type of the system.
        Returns:
        server if this is a server, client if this is a client and a lowercase classname if this is anything else.

      • getTypeTitle

        default java.lang.String getTypeTitle()
        Gets the type of the system in title case.
        Returns:
        Server if this is a server, Client if this is a client and a title case classname if this is anything else.

      • toTitleCase

        static java.lang.String toTitleCase(java.lang.String word)
        Converts a string to title case
        Parameters:
        word - The string to convert.
        Returns:
        A title case string.

      • init

        void init()
        Initialises the system.

      • update

        void update(double delta)
        Called per tick for an update.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time since the last tick in seconds.

      • getTickSpeed

        double getTickSpeed()
        Gets the speed of the system in ticks per second.
        Returns:
        A double value.

      • getMainThreadName

        java.lang.String getMainThreadName()
        Gets the name to be used for the main thread of the system.
        Returns:
        A string value.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the system.

      • isInit

        boolean isInit()
        Determines if initialisation has been completed.
        Returns:
        true if init() has finished executing, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        init()

      • getDebugFrame

        DebugFrame getDebugFrame()
        Gets the most recent debug frame for the system.
        Returns:
        A complete debug frame.
